survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Collaboration Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees about their satisfaction and experience with digital collaboration tools used in the workplace.

questions.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you regularly use at work?
answer_options: Google Workspace (e.g., Google Meet, Google Chat)
questions.client_notes: Consider providing an 'Other' option with a text field for respondents to specify additional tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-ended field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you regularly use at work?
answer_options: Google Workspace (e.g., Google Meet, Google Chat)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your organization?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using digital collaboration tools?
answer_options: Difficulty in integrating with other tools
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture overlapping challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-ended field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using digital collaboration tools?
answer_options: Difficulty in integrating with other tools

questions.question_text: How has the use of digital collaboration tools impacted your productivity?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure productivity impact.

script.question_text: How has the use of digital collaboration tools impacted your productivity?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital collaboration tools used in your organization?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital collaboration tools used in your organization?
